foreignData.name: Abhärtung
foreignData.text: Verhindere bis zu X Schadenspunkte bei einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl. Lege für jeden Schadenspunkt, der auf diese Art verhindert wurde, eine +1/+1 Marke auf diese Kreatur.

name: Temper
originalText: Prevent up to X damage to target creature. For each 1 damage prevented in this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

rulings.text: You can make X be larger than the amount of damage, but you only get one counter for each actual point of damage prevented.
The +1/+1 counters do show up at the same time as any unprevented damage, which means they are there before you check for lethal damage.

text: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
